qas.question: How many cities or towns are there in all of England and Wales with a ceremonial sheriff acting as the Mayor's deputy?
Who's the current Mayor of Southampton?
What's the name of the 578th sheriff of Southampton?
When did John Melody, the town crier of Southampton, pass away?
How many decibels was John Melody able to reach in his cry?

context: The city has a Mayor and is one of the <a0_0>16<a0_0/> cities and towns in England and Wales to have a ceremonial sheriff who acts as a deputy for the Mayor. The current and 793rd Mayor of Southampton is <a1_0>Linda Norris<a1_0/>. <a2_0>Catherine McEwing<a2_0/> is the current and 578th sherriff. The town crier from 2004 until his death in <a3_0>2014<a3_0/> was John Melody, who acted as master of ceremonies in the city and who possessed a cry of <a4_0>104<a4_0/> decibels.
